label: [.heroku] flow for static red-erik.org website
info: This flow is executed when ErlangRED is deployed to heroku.

name: index page content
template:
Hi There,

and Hello World!

Test pattern page for testing Erlang-RED: visual low coding for Erlang inspired by NodeRED.

name: HTML Layout
template:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="{{ page.lang | default: site.lang | default: "en" }}">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
    <!-- <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"> -->
    
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

    <title>Red Erik</title>

    <meta name="generator" content="Erlang-RED v.0.0.0-beta0" />
    <meta property="og:title" content="{{{ page.title }}} | {{ blogdetails.title }}" />
    <meta property="og:description" content="{{{ page.summary }}}" />
    <meta property="og:locale" content="en_AU" />
    <meta property="og:url" content="{{{ blogdetails.url }}}{{{ blogdetails.path_prefix }}}/{{ page.path }}" />
    <meta property="og:site_name" content="{{{ blogdetails.url }}}" />
    <meta name="giscus:backlink" content="{{{ blogdetails.url }}}{{{ blogdetails.path_prefix }}}/{{ page.path }}">

    {{#page.image}}
    <meta property="og:image" content="{{{ blogdetails.cdn_url }}}/content/{{{ page.image }}}" />
    {{/page.image}}

    <link rel="canonical" href="{{{ blogdetails.url }}}{{{ blogdetails.path_prefix }}}/{{ page.path }}" />
    <meta name="twitter:card" content="{{{ blogdetails.url }}}{{{ blogdetails.path_prefix }}}/{{ page.path }}" />
    <meta property="twitter:title" content="{{ page.title }}" />

    <link rel="alternate" type="application/rss+xml" href="/feed.xml" title="Subscribe to Blog Open Mind Map Org">
    <link rel="sitemap" type="application/xml" title="Sitemap" href="/sitemap.xml">

    <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="180x180" href="{{{ blogdetails.cdn_url }}}/content/apple-touch-icon.png">
    <link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="32x32" href="{{{ blogdetails.cdn_url }}}/content/favicon-32x32.png">
    <link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="16x16" href="{{{ blogdetails.cdn_url }}}/content/favicon-16x16.png">

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/f/style.css">
    <link rel="manifest" href="/f/site.webmanifest">
    <link rel="author" href="/humans.txt" />

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.openmindmap.org/thirdparty/a11y-light.min.css">


  </head>

  <body>
    <center style="margin-top: 100px; ">
          {{{ payload }}}
    </center>
  </body>
</html>
